name: Wanderlust Earrings - Inspired by the Film
description:
These earrings are Wanderlust-inspired organically shaped sterling silver circles suspended from handmade sterling silver ear wires. The circles are roughly the size of a dime. Lightweight, simple, gorgeous. 

They go with absolutely everything and can accessorize a business suit, a casual evening ensemble or a group of bridesmaids.

Here is how they came to be: I recently saw the movie Wanderlust starring Jennifer Aniston and Paul Rudd. During the film, I kept noticing Aniston's beautifully simple circle earrings. I tried researching the designer behind them so I could purchase a pair for myself, but all I could find was information about Aniston's jewelry designer friend who, as far as I can tell, did not design the earrings. She designed the necklaces and rings seen in the film, but no credit was attributed to the silver circles. 

So, after Googling every possible word combination and finally running out of ideas, I decided to make a similar pair myself. And I loved wearing them so much, I made a few more pairs to sell in my shop!

View more photos of these earrings here:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/107180583/wanderlust-earrings-inspired-by-the-film

name: Custom Class Ring - 2013 Graduation Gift
description:
Ever wish there was some alternative to the traditional, bulky class rings they sell to students? Well now there is! I will create a unique sterling silver class ring just for you.

You choose the band style (thin or thick, wide or skinny) and the finish you prefer (brushed, polished or hammered) and let me know exactly what you'd like it to say. Maybe it's your name or your goofy nickname. Maybe it's the name of your school or simply "CLASS OF 2013" (any year is available). Stamp it on the outside and tell the world you graduated, or stamp it on the inside for a more discreet look.

The point is your class ring should represent who you are. Not who everyone else is. These rings are available for men and women and can be made in all sizes!

I sure wish options like this were readily available when I was in high school...maybe I wouldn't have ended up with that chunky thing that sits tarnishing at the bottom of my jewelry box!

Custom orders will be ready in just two weeks! Also, check out my CLASS NECKLACES! https://www.etsy.com/listing/46584161/graduation-necklace-class-of-2013-custom

name: Custom Class of 2013 Graduation Necklace
description:
Ever wish there was some alternative to the traditional, bulky class rings they sell to students? Well now there is! I will create a unique sterling silver class necklace just for you. Show your school spirit in style!

A gorgeous sterling silver circle is hand cut and custom stamped with your class year, school name and initials. A bead representing your school color (or 2 beads if your school has 2 colors) hangs in the center of the circle. A 16" sterling silver chain and gift box are included.

*** When placing your order, please write instructions in the "Notes to Seller" field indicating what you would like stamped on your necklace and your school colors.

For example:
FRONT - Class of 2013
BACK - LMD / Eastern High
School color is royal blue

I custom cut and stamp each circle individually, therefore slight variations in size, shape and letter spacing may occur. Custom orders will be ready in just two weeks! Convo me if you need an order expedited.

Also, check out my CLASS RINGS:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/61687518/graduation-ring-class-of-2013

name: Tension & Kinetic Energy Wood Ring
description:
I like to fidget when I'm bored, so I absolutely love wearing jewelry that I can play with. The gorgeous wood piece on this ring spins on its axis. No more boredom!

I also like a good challenge, and it was a bit of a puzzle to figure out how to to engineer this ring â€“ it's held together only by tension. No soldering, no glue, just sterling silver and wood.

View more photos of this item here:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/48688503/tension-and-kinetic-energy-ring-in

*** PLEASE SPECIFY YOUR RING SIZE WHEN ORDERING***

name: Personalized Mother's Birthstone Eternity Necklace
description:
This piece was featured on www.craftgawker.com!

The perfect gift for any mother, grandmother, friend, daughter or sister. Sterling silver eternity circles are handcut and custom stamped for each child, and a birthstone is delicately suspended within each circle. A 16" sterling silver chain and gift box are included.

*** PLEASE SPECIFY IN THE BUYERS NOTES THE NAME AND BIRTH MONTH OF EACH CHILD.*** 

Birthstones will be a combination of precious gemstones, crystals and pearls. Please note: CZs will be substituted for April diamonds and Swarovski crystals will be substituted for precious gemstones in some cases to keep necklace prices reasonable.
January - Garnet
February - Amethyst
March - Aquamarine
April - CZ
May - Emerald
June - Pearl
July - Ruby
August - Peridot
September - Sapphire
October - Opal
November - Citrine
December - Topaz

You can order this necklace with one, two or three silver circles.
Please see my listings on Etsy (lofteddesigns.etsy.com) to order the one or three circle version. Twins and triplets may be combined on one circle if the length of the names allows (contact me before ordering to check).

I custom cut and stamp each circle individually. Slight variations in size, shape and letter spacing may occur. Please allow up to two weeks for custom orders, however I will try to fulfill your order as soon as possible.
